alert.note: Alert for Dawson; Garfield; McCone; Prairie; Richland; Roosevelt; Sheridan; Wibaux (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 04 at 5:21PM MDT until June 04 at 6:15PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: The National Weather Service in Glasgow has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Wibaux County in northeastern Montana... Southeastern Garfield County in northeastern Montana... Southeastern Roosevelt County in northeastern Montana... Southern Sheridan County in northeastern Montana... Southeastern McCone County in northeastern Montana... Prairie County in northeastern Montana... Dawson County in northeastern Montana... Richland County in northeastern Montana... * Until 615 PM MDT. * At 520 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near East Fairview to 17 miles southwest of Terry, moving northwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotter reported an estimated wind gust of 60 mph at 5:20 pm. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Sidney, Glendive, Culbertson, Terry, Fallon, Fairview, Bainville, Richey, Savage, West Glendive, Skaar, Intake, Bloomfield, Fort Union Trading Post, Lambert, Lindsay, East Fairview, Enid, Nohly and Wooley. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Dawson; Garfield; McCone; Prairie; Richland; Roosevelt; Sheridan; Wibaux
